remarks: Any vertex in a friendship graph does not have degree 1, see remark 2 in [MertziosUnger] p. 153 (after Proposition 1):  "... no node v of it [a friendship graph] may have deg(v) = 1.".  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 21-Dec-2017.)
statement: vdgn1frgrav2 $p |- ( ( V FriendGrph E /\ N e. V ) -> ( 1 < ( # ` V ) -> ( ( V VDeg E ) ` N ) =/= 1 ) ) $.
